items.question: How do I get started with meditation?
items.answer: Simply open the app and tap the "Meditate" button on the home screen. Choose a preset session or create your own custom session. The app will guide you through the meditation with optional bells and ambient sounds.

items.question: Does the app work offline?
items.answer: Yes! Slow Spot is designed to work 100% offline. All meditation sessions, sounds, and features are available without an internet connection. Your data is stored locally on your device.

items.question: How do I set up meditation reminders?
items.answer: Go to your Profile screen and tap "Schedule Reminder". You can choose your preferred time for daily meditation reminders. The app will request calendar permission to create these reminders.

items.question: Can I create custom meditation sessions?
items.answer: Yes! Tap the "+" button in the Meditation screen to create a custom session. You can customize the duration, ambient sounds, interval bells, and more.

items.question: How do I change the app language?
items.answer: Go to Settings and find the Language section. Slow Spot supports English, Polish, Spanish, German, French, Hindi, and Chinese.

items.question: How do I delete my data?
items.answer: Go to Settings > Data & Privacy > "Clear Data" to delete all your local data. Alternatively, uninstalling the app will remove all data from your device. Since we don't store any data on servers, there's nothing else to delete.

items.question: Is my data private?
items.answer: Absolutely. Slow Spot doesn't collect, transmit, or store any of your personal data on external servers. All your meditation history, preferences, and progress remain on your device only.

items.question: The app is not working properly. What should I do?
items.answer: Try these steps: 1) Close and reopen the app, 2) Restart your device, 3) Make sure you have the latest version from App Store or Google Play. If the problem persists, please contact us with details about the issue.

core.title: Our Privacy Promise
core.content: Slow Spot is designed with privacy as its foundation. We believe that meditation is a deeply personal experience that deserves absolute privacy protection. Unlike most applications, we have built Slow Spot to function entirely without collecting, processing, or storing any personal data on external servers.

whatWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
whatWeCollect.content: We collect absolutely no personal data. Zero. Slow Spot is a fully offline application that operates entirely on your device. We do not collect, process, transmit, sell, or share any information about you, your device, or your usage patterns. All your meditation preferences, session history, progress statistics, and personal settings remain exclusively on your device.

localStorage.title: Data Stored Locally On Your Device
localStorage.intro: The app stores the following information exclusively on your device:
items: Your preferences (language selection, theme settings, sound preferences)
Progress statistics including streaks and total meditation time
Calendar reminders (only if you enable this feature)
localStorage.note: This data never leaves your device. We have no access to it, cannot view it, and cannot transmit it.

noTracking.title: No Tracking, No Analytics
noTracking.content: We do not use any form of analytics, tracking, or telemetry. We do not know how many users we have, how often the app is used, which features are popular, or any other usage statistics. This is by design. Your meditation practice is nobody's business but yours.

permissions.title: App Permissions
permissions.content: Slow Spot requires minimal permissions to function. The only optional permission is Calendar access, which is only requested if you choose to create meditation reminders. You can use all core features without granting any permissions.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We do not integrate any third-party analytics, advertising networks, social media trackers, or data collection services. All audio content is from royalty-free sources and is bundled with the app - no data is transmitted to external servers.

children.title: Children's Privacy (COPPA Compliance)
children.content: Since Slow Spot collects no personal data whatsoever, the app is inherently safe for users of all ages, including children under 13. We comply with COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Protection Act) and equivalent international regulations by virtue of not collecting any data.

international.title: International Privacy Compliance
international.content: Slow Spot's privacy-by-design approach ensures compliance with major international privacy regulations including: GDPR (European Union), CCPA/CPRA (California, USA), LGPD (Brazil), POPIA (South Africa), Australian Privacy Principles (Australia), PIPEDA (Canada), and other regional privacy laws. Since we collect no personal data, we exceed the requirements of these regulations.

yourRights.title: Your Data Rights
yourRights.content: Under various privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA, etc.), you have rights regarding your personal data. With Slow Spot, exercising these rights is simple: View your data anytime within the app, delete all data via Settings > Data & Privacy > Clear Data, or delete everything by uninstalling the app. Since no data exists on our servers, there is nothing additional to request or delete.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: Your data is secured by your device's built-in security features. We recommend using device encryption and screen lock for additional protection. Since data never leaves your device, there is no risk of data breaches on our end.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or for legal compliance. Any material changes will be communicated through app updates. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.note: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us.

legal.title: Legal Basis
legal.content: This Privacy Policy is governed by Polish law. For users in the European Union, the data controller would be Slow Spot (contact details above). However, as we collect no personal data, data controller obligations do not apply in the traditional sense.
